MealPass is an Australian market leader when it comes to targeting food waste at the retail level.We help food merchants reduce the amount of food that gets thrown away every day because it is not sold. We provide an app where merchants can post and sell the excess food at discounted prices.
Please click on link to know more about us

We accept all Mastercard and Visa Debit and Credit cards. Your payment information is transmitted securely using SSL encryption technology and is stored and processed through a secure third party payment gateway in cooperation with the banks above. MealPass does not store your payment information on our server. Any payment information saved is only stored within your device. 


For any enquiries please contact our 24/7 customer support line at: 1300 848 428

Yes! I would like to be on MealPass wall of fame.
is a proud sponsor of MealPass food donation platform.
Congratulation! Code Verified. Now enjoy your magic portion free of cost

What is a MealPass sponsor? 

A MealPass sponsor is a supporter of MealPass revolutionising digital food donation platform where food retailers can donate food directly to the recipients in their local communities in collaboration with food charities. The platform targets the end-of-day-unsold food (70% of total excess food) which food charities are unable to collect and redistribute.


Why become MealPass sponsor?

A sponsorship can go a long way for someone in need and you can make a huge difference to someone's life by supporting MealPass food donation platform. Together we can reduce hunger and food waste, which are 2 of the most pressing issues in the world today.


How to become MealPass sponsor?

Becoming a sponsor of MealPass food donation platform is easy:

1- You can sponsor meal donations from a specific food retailer where you decide how many daily meals you want to sponsor and for how many days. The price can vary from food retailer to food retailer.

OR

2- You can sponsor the hard work of expanding and implementing MealPass food donation platform in local communities all over the country where people need help. This sponsorship can be a one off or recurring.

You can pay either by credit card or bank transfer.

Every sponsor will be offered a place on our sponsors wall of fame page where your picture/company logo together with your name and city/country will be visible and is shown both on our app and our website. Please note that it is not mandatory to be placed on our wall of fame. The choice is all yours.
Are you sure you want to close the sale for today?
